commit.message:
configure.in (gcc_cv_ld_hidden): Don't test gnu_ld_flag.

	* configure.in (gcc_cv_ld_hidden): Don't test gnu_ld_flag.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r71484

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2003-09-17  Rainer Orth  <ro@TechFak.Uni-Bielefeld.DE>
+
+	* configure.in (gcc_cv_ld_hidden): Don't test gnu_ld_flag.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
 2003-09-17  Mark Mitchell  <mark@codesourcery.com>
 
 	PR debug/12066

@@ -6302,9 +6302,7 @@ else
     fi
   else
     # non-GNU linkers don't seem to support .hidden yet
-    if test x"$gnu_ld_flag" = x"no"; then
-      gcc_cv_ld_hidden=no
-    fi
+    gcc_cv_ld_hidden=no
   fi
 fi
 fi
@@ -6322,7 +6320,7 @@ fi
 
 # Check if we have .[us]leb128, and support symbol arithmetic with it.
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler for .sleb128 and .uleb128""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6326: checking assembler for .sleb128 and .uleb128" >&5
+echo "configure:6324: checking assembler for .sleb128 and .uleb128" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_leb128'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6339,7 +6337,7 @@ L1:
 	.uleb128 1280
 	.sleb128 -1010
 L2:' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6343: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6341: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	# GAS versions before 2.11 do not support uleb128,
   # despite appearing to.
@@ -6375,7 +6373,7 @@ fi
 # GAS versions up to and including 2.11.0 may mis-optimize
 # .eh_frame data.
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler for eh_frame optimization""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6379: checking assembler for eh_frame optimization" >&5
+echo "configure:6377: checking assembler for eh_frame optimization" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_eh_frame'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6418,7 +6416,7 @@ __FRAME_BEGIN__:
 	.byte	0x4
 	.4byte	.L1-.LFB1
 .LEFDE1:' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6422: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6420: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	  cat > conftest.lit <<EOF
  0000 10000000 00000000 017a0001 781a0004  .........z..x...
@@ -6439,7 +6437,7 @@ EOF
     || cmp conftest.big conftest.got > /dev/null 2>&1; }
   then
     gcc_cv_as_eh_frame=yes
-  elif { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -o conftest.o --traditional-format /dev/null'; { (eval echo configure:6443: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }; then
+  elif { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -o conftest.o --traditional-format /dev/null'; { (eval echo configure:6441: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }; then
     gcc_cv_as_eh_frame=buggy
   else
     # Uh oh, what do we do now?
@@ -6464,7 +6462,7 @@ EOF
 fi
 
 echo $ac_n "checking assembler for section merging support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6468: checking assembler for section merging support" >&5
+echo "configure:6466: checking assembler for section merging support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_shf_merge'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6476,7 +6474,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo '.section .rodata.str, "aMS", @progbits, 1' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as --fatal-warnings -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6480: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as --fatal-warnings -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6478: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_shf_merge=yes
     else
@@ -6702,7 +6700,7 @@ if test -z "$tls_first_major"; then
   : # If we don't have a check, assume no support.
 else
   echo $ac_n "checking assembler for thread-local storage support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6706: checking assembler for thread-local storage support" >&5
+echo "configure:6704: checking assembler for thread-local storage support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_tls'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6713,7 +6711,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo "$conftest_s" > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as $tls_as_opt --fatal-warnings -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6717: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as $tls_as_opt --fatal-warnings -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6715: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_tls=yes
     else
@@ -6739,7 +6737,7 @@ case "$target" in
   # All TARGET_ABI_OSF targets.
   alpha*-*-osf* | alpha*-*-linux* | alpha*-*-*bsd*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for explicit relocation support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6743: checking assembler for explicit relocation support" >&5
+echo "configure:6741: checking assembler for explicit relocation support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_alpha_explicit_relocs'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6762,7 +6760,7 @@ fi
 	ldah	$1, d($29)	!gprelhigh
 	lda	$1, d($1)	!gprellow
 	lda	$29, 0($29)	!gpdisp!3' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6766: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6764: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_alpha_explicit_relocs=yes
     else
@@ -6784,14 +6782,14 @@ fi
 
   sparc*-*-*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for .register""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6788: checking assembler for .register" >&5
+echo "configure:6786: checking assembler for .register" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_sparc_register_op'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
   gcc_cv_as_sparc_register_op=no
   if test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo '.register %g2, #scratch' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6795: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6793: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_sparc_register_op=yes
     else
@@ -6811,14 +6809,14 @@ EOF
 fi
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for -relax option""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6815: checking assembler for -relax option" >&5
+echo "configure:6813: checking assembler for -relax option" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_sparc_relax'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
   gcc_cv_as_sparc_relax=no
   if test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo '.text' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -relax -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6822: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -relax -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6820: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_sparc_relax=yes
     else
@@ -6838,7 +6836,7 @@ EOF
 fi
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for unaligned pcrel relocs""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6842: checking assembler for unaligned pcrel relocs" >&5
+echo "configure:6840: checking assembler for unaligned pcrel relocs" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_sparc_ua_pcrel'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6851,7 +6849,7 @@ foo:
 .align 4
 .byte 0
 .uaword %r_disp32(foo)' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -K PIC -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6855: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -K PIC -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6853: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	if test x$gcc_cv_ld != x \
        && $gcc_cv_ld -o conftest conftest.o -G > /dev/null 2>&1; then
@@ -6874,7 +6872,7 @@ EOF
 
 
       echo $ac_n "checking assembler for unaligned pcrel relocs against hidden symbols""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6878: checking assembler for unaligned pcrel relocs against hidden symbols" >&5
+echo "configure:6876: checking assembler for unaligned pcrel relocs against hidden symbols" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_sparc_ua_pcrel_hidden'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6889,7 +6887,7 @@ else
 .hidden foo
 foo:
 .skip 4' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -K PIC -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6893: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -K PIC -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6891: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	if test x$gcc_cv_ld != x && test x$gcc_cv_objdump != x \
 	 && $gcc_cv_ld -o conftest conftest.o -G > /dev/null 2>&1 \
@@ -6922,7 +6920,7 @@ fi
 fi # unaligned pcrel relocs
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for offsetable %lo()""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6926: checking assembler for offsetable %lo()" >&5
+echo "configure:6924: checking assembler for offsetable %lo()" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_sparc_offsetable_lo10'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6931,7 +6929,7 @@ else
     echo '.text
 	or %g1, %lo(ab) + 12, %g1
 	or %g1, %lo(ab + 12), %g1' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -xarch=v9 -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6935: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as -xarch=v9 -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6933: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	if test x$gcc_cv_objdump != x \
        && %gcc_cv_objdump -s -j .text conftest.o 2> /dev/null \
@@ -6957,7 +6955,7 @@ fi
 
   i[34567]86-*-* | x86_64-*-*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for filds and fists mnemonics""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6961: checking assembler for filds and fists mnemonics" >&5
+echo "configure:6959: checking assembler for filds and fists mnemonics" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_ix86_filds_fists'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -6968,7 +6966,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo 'filds mem; fists mem' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6972: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6970: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_ix86_filds_fists=yes
     else
@@ -6988,14 +6986,14 @@ EOF
 fi
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for cmov syntax""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:6992: checking assembler for cmov syntax" >&5
+echo "configure:6990: checking assembler for cmov syntax" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_ix86_cmov_sun_syntax'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
   gcc_cv_as_ix86_cmov_sun_syntax=no
   if test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo 'cmovl.l %edx, %eax' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6999: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:6997: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_ix86_cmov_sun_syntax=yes
     else
@@ -7017,7 +7015,7 @@ fi
     # This one is used unconditionally by i386.[ch]; it is to be defined
     # to 1 if the feature is present, 0 otherwise.
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for GOTOFF in data""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7021: checking assembler for GOTOFF in data" >&5
+echo "configure:7019: checking assembler for GOTOFF in data" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_ix86_gotoff_in_data'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7032,7 +7030,7 @@ fi
 	nop
 	.data
 	.long .L0@GOTOFF' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7036: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7034: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_ix86_gotoff_in_data=yes
     else
@@ -7053,7 +7051,7 @@ EOF
 
   ia64*-*-*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for ltoffx and ldxmov relocs""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7057: checking assembler for ltoffx and ldxmov relocs" >&5
+echo "configure:7055: checking assembler for ltoffx and ldxmov relocs" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_ia64_ltoffx_ldxmov_relocs'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7067,7 +7065,7 @@ fi
 	addl r15 = @ltoffx(x#), gp
 	;;
 	ld8.mov r16 = [r15], x#' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7071: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7069: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_ia64_ltoffx_ldxmov_relocs=yes
     else
@@ -7097,7 +7095,7 @@ fi
 	mfcr 3,128"
 
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for mfcr field support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7101: checking assembler for mfcr field support" >&5
+echo "configure:7099: checking assembler for mfcr field support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_powerpc_mfcrf'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7108,7 +7106,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo "$conftest_s" > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7112: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7110: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_powerpc_mfcrf=yes
     else
@@ -7130,7 +7128,7 @@ fi
 
   mips*-*-*)
     echo $ac_n "checking assembler for explicit relocation support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7134: checking assembler for explicit relocation support" >&5
+echo "configure:7132: checking assembler for explicit relocation support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_mips_explicit_relocs'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7141,7 +7139,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo '	lw $4,%gp_rel(foo)($4)' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7145: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7143: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_mips_explicit_relocs=yes
     else
@@ -7187,7 +7185,7 @@ if test x"$insn" != x; then
 	.loc 1 3 0
 	$insn"
  echo $ac_n "checking assembler for dwarf2 debug_line support""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7191: checking assembler for dwarf2 debug_line support" >&5
+echo "configure:7189: checking assembler for dwarf2 debug_line support" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_dwarf2_debug_line'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7199,7 +7197,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo "$conftest_s" > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7203: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7201: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	# ??? This fails with non-gnu grep.  Maybe use objdump?
    if grep debug_line conftest.o > /dev/null 2>&1; then
@@ -7221,15 +7219,15 @@ echo "$ac_t""$gcc_cv_as_dwarf2_debug_line" 1>&6
 # by DW_AT_decl_file.  Approximate this test by testing if
 # the assembler bitches if the same index is assigned twice.
  echo $ac_n "checking assembler for buggy dwarf2 .file directive""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7225: checking assembler for buggy dwarf2 .file directive" >&5
+echo "configure:7223: checking assembler for buggy dwarf2 .file directive" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_dwarf2_file_buggy'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
   gcc_cv_as_dwarf2_file_buggy=no
   if test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo '	.file 1 "foo.s"
 	.file 1 "bar.s"' > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7233: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as  -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7231: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_dwarf2_file_buggy=yes
     else
@@ -7252,7 +7250,7 @@ EOF
  fi
 
  echo $ac_n "checking assembler for --gdwarf2 option""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7256: checking assembler for --gdwarf2 option" >&5
+echo "configure:7254: checking assembler for --gdwarf2 option" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_gdwarf2_flag'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7264,7 +7262,7 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
     echo "$insn" > conftest.s
-    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as --gdwarf2 -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7268: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
+    if { ac_try='$gcc_cv_as --gdwarf2 -o conftest.o conftest.s >&5'; { (eval echo configure:7266: \"$ac_try\") 1>&5; (eval $ac_try) 2>&5; }; }
     then
 	gcc_cv_as_gdwarf2_flag=yes
     else
@@ -7284,7 +7282,7 @@ EOF
 fi
 
  echo $ac_n "checking assembler for --gstabs option""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:7288: checking assembler for --gstabs option" >&5
+echo "configure:7286: checking assembler for --gstabs option" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_as_gstabs_flag'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -7296,12 +7294,12 @@ else
 fi
   elif test x$gcc_cv_as != x; then
